member.name: WIN32_MEMORY_REGION_INFORMATION
member.summary: Contains information about a memory region. A memory region is a single allocation that is created using a memory allocation function, such as or .

member.name: WIN32_MEMORY_REGION_INFORMATION.AllocationBase
member.summary: The base address of the allocation.

member.name: WIN32_MEMORY_REGION_INFORMATION.AllocationProtect
member.summary: The page protection value that was specified when the allocation was created. Protections of individual pages within the allocation can be different from this value. To query protection values of individual pages, use the function.

member.name: WIN32_MEMORY_REGION_INFORMATION.DUMMYUNIONNAME.Flags
member.summary: Represents all memory region flags as a single ULONG value. Applications should not use this field. Instead, test the individual bit field flags defined below.

member.name: WIN32_MEMORY_REGION_INFORMATION.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.Private
member.summary: A value of 1 indicates that the allocation is private to the process.

member.name: WIN32_MEMORY_REGION_INFORMATION.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.MappedDataFile
member.summary: A value of 1 indicates that the allocation is a mapped view of a data file.

member.name: WIN32_MEMORY_REGION_INFORMATION.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.MappedImage
member.summary: A value of 1 indicates that the allocation is a mapped view of an executable image.

member.name: WIN32_MEMORY_REGION_INFORMATION.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.MappedPageFile
member.summary: A value of 1 indicates that the allocation is a mapped view of a pagefile-backed section.

member.name: WIN32_MEMORY_REGION_INFORMATION.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.MappedPhysical
member.summary: A value of 1 indicates that the allocation is a view of the \Device\PhysicalMemory section.

member.name: WIN32_MEMORY_REGION_INFORMATION.DUMMYUNIONNAME.DUMMYSTRUCTNAME.DirectMapped
member.summary: A value of 1 indicates that the allocation is a mapped view of a direct-mapped file.

member.name: WIN32_MEMORY_REGION_INFORMATION.CommitSize
member.summary: The commit charge associated with the allocation. For private allocations, this is the combined size of pages in the region that are committed, as opposed to reserved. For mapped views, this is the combined size of pages that have copy-on-write protection, or have been made private as a result of copy-on-write.
